survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their dining experience at our plant-based restaurant to improve service quality and menu offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you dine at our plant-based restaurant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you dine at our plant-based restaurant?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to dine with us today? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to dine with us today? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the taste and quality of your meal?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure clear labeling.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the taste and quality of your meal?

questions.question_text: What menu items would you like to see added or improved?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What menu items would you like to see added or improved?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our restaurant to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our restaurant to others?
